sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of Vacuum Dryer for drying heat-sensitive materials.
sections.scope: Applicable to drying activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Clean the dryer chamber and trays and ensure the door seal is intact.
Load the wet material on trays and place them inside the chamber.
Close the door and tighten the clamps securely.
Switch ON the heating system and set the target temperature.
Start the vacuum pump and monitor the pressure gauge.
Maintain the required vacuum level throughout the drying process.
Periodically check the material through the sight glass if available.
Once dried, turn OFF the heater and break the vacuum slowly.
Allow the chamber to reach atmospheric pressure before opening.
Unload the material and clean the chamber and trays.
precautions: Check vacuum pump oil levels and filters regularly.
Break the vacuum gradually to prevent powder dispersion.
Monitor for any leaks in the door gasket or valves.
Wear appropriate PPE when handling hot or dried materials.
Ensure the condenser is working to collect solvent vapors if necessary.
